mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS member_id, m.name AS member_name, d.name AS dept_name, g.name AS grade_name FROM member m JOIN dept d ON m.dept_id = d.id JOIN grade g ON m.grade_id = g.id WHERE m.id NOT IN ( SELECT cu.member_id FROM chatroom_user cu WHERE cu.chatroom_id = #{room_id} ) ORDER BY d.id, g.seq
